title: webinterface: owncloud keps and internal list of category members, which is not updated, if a member is withdrawn via carddav (sogo-connector)
body:
this can be reproduced with thunderbird 17.0.3 esr, inverse sogo-connector 10.0.5 and owncloud 5.0.11. 

have a categorie a with a set of members. in thunderbird move all members of category a to a new category b (addrbook->contactlist->rightclick->categories). do it again and move all members of category b to category c. (category a and b are empty now, since no contact is assigned).

log into owncloud webinterface and see that we have category a, b and c all with the same members. however, if you click on one member of category a or b and view its properties, you see that he truly is only part of category c. 

-> the left category pane uses a list (cache?), which is updated via carddav sync but only if a contact is added, not withdrawn. keep in mind, that we see category b, which should be totally unknown to the webinterface.

you can go one step further: have an additional category z which has differnt members than a/b/c. in thunderbird move all members of category z to category b (which is actually empty). log into owncloud webinterface and see that category b now holds the merged members of category z and the former category a (now c), and category z still being there.
